thread.title: Perfect location
thread.title_full: Perfect location - Review of Hotel Beauchamps, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Shanta D
title: Perfect location
text:
I thoroughly enjoyed my stay here. Located close to the metro network, the hotel is perfectly situated for guest to experience the local shops and attractions.
The staff were very helpful and took the time to find out what terminal my aeroplane departed from so I wouldn't waste time at the airport.
The room was a little on the small side but perfect for me as I was travelling alone. The bed was one of the most comfortable beds I have ever slept on. It was womb like! The bathroom was decent. I would go back again.
